amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that financial advisors should treat women fairly in drafting wills and trusts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 6 printed in H. Rept. 106-214 to express the "Sense of the Congress" that estate planners, trust officers, investment advisors, and other financial planners and advisors should develop fairer and more balanced presentations that eliminate stereotypical examples which lead to actions that are financially detrimental to women.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
